description: A document of some sort (PDF, TIFF, HTML) associated with a filing

uid.description: Unique id/reference for the filing if it has one

file_format.description: Format of the document, if known

original_source_url.description: Persistent URL for the document, if there is one

source_url.description: Source url of the web page for the filing or if there is not persistent URL the page from which it can be found (e.g. search page)

source_location.description: If the accounts filing has been put on sources.opencorporates.com the path to the filing

language.description: Should be represented as two-letter ISO-639 code

classification.description: type of document (at the moment only XBRL is the only option here)
